rationale: The patient's report of improved blood sugar control since starting empagliflozin was not documented.
The note advises on hydration but does not mention increased thirst as a side effect of empagliflozin.
There is no mention of addressing the patient's difficulty in maintaining the dosing schedule due to irregular work hours.
The note suggests using an app or alarm to help the patient remember medication dosing.
There is no documentation of any assessment or follow-up plan regarding the patient's weight gain concern.
The note mentions the patient's job in the context of hydration but not in relation to medication adherence.
